press_foot_pad.description: Press the foot pad to unlock the trash can lid.

clean_foot_pad.description: Clean the foot pad to ensure it functions smoothly.

clean_cover_lid.description: Clean the cover lid to maintain hygiene.

clean_trashcan_body.description: Clean the trashcan body to maintain cleanliness and hygiene.

press_foot_pad_and_clean_lid.description: First press the footpad to open the lid and then clean the lid.

clean_entire_trashcan.description: Press the footpad to open the lid and clean the entire trashcan, including foot pad, lid, and body.
